title: [pytorch]make error:error: #include_next is a GCC extension
body_html:
I am compiling pytorch from source with cmake.
my cmake command is:
cmake -D CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr/local/pytorch/ -D PYTHON_EXECUTABLE=/usr/bin/python3.6m -D PYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR=/usr/include/python3.6m/ -D PYTHON_LIBRARY=/usr/lib64/libpython3.6m.so -D PYTHON_LIB_REL_PATH=lib64/python3.6/site-packages/ -D USE_OPENMP=ON -D USE_FFMPEG=ON -D USE_CUDA=ON ..
Then I used make -j 4 to compile, and got error:
Scanning dependencies of target benchmark [ 7%] Building CXX object third_party/benchmark/src/CMakeFiles/benchmark.dir/benchmark.cc.o In file included from /home/ice/packageLinux/pytorch/pytorch/third_party/benchmark/include/benchmark/benchmark.h:172:0, from /home/ice/packageLinux/pytorch/pytorch/third_party/benchmark/src/benchmark.cc:15: /usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/5.4.0/include/stdint.h:9:3: error: include_next is a GCC extension
gcc version:gcc --version gcc (Gentoo 6.4.0-r1 p1.3) 6.4.0 Copyright (C) 2017 Free Software Foundation, Inc. This is free software; see the source for copying conditions. There is NO warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
cmake version:cmake --version cmake version 3.9.6 CMake suite maintained and supported by Kitware (kitware.com/cmake).
CUDA version:9.0
cudnn version: 7.0.5
How to solve the problem:error: #include_next is a GCC extension? Thanks.

body:
I am compiling pytorch from source with cmake.
my cmake command is:
`cmake -D CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr/local/pytorch/ -D PYTHON_EXECUTABLE=/usr/bin/python3.6m -D PYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR=/usr/include/python3.6m/ -D PYTHON_LIBRARY=/usr/lib64/libpython3.6m.so -D PYTHON_LIB_REL_PATH=lib64/python3.6/site-packages/ -D USE_OPENMP=ON -D USE_FFMPEG=ON -D USE_CUDA=ON ..`
Then I used `make -j 4` to compile, and got error:
`Scanning dependencies of target benchmark
[  7%] Building CXX object third_party/benchmark/src/CMakeFiles/benchmark.dir/benchmark.cc.o
In file included from /home/ice/packageLinux/pytorch/pytorch/third_party/benchmark/include/benchmark/benchmark.h:172:0,
from /home/ice/packageLinux/pytorch/pytorch/third_party/benchmark/src/benchmark.cc:15:
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/5.4.0/include/stdint.h:9:3: error: include_next is a GCC extension
`
gcc version:`gcc --version
gcc (Gentoo 6.4.0-r1 p1.3) 6.4.0
Copyright (C) 2017 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.`
cmake version:`cmake --version
cmake version 3.9.6
CMake suite maintained and supported by Kitware (kitware.com/cmake).`
CUDA version:9.0
cudnn version: 7.0.5
How to solve the problem:error: #include_next is a GCC extension? Thanks.
